scope.objective: Define completion criteria for FrankenNode Phase 6, emit practical-finish signal, and defer non-critical documentation to wrap-up stage.

invariants: Every required gate contract must exist and validate against its schema
Zero open child beads under bd-3ar8v.7 at practical-finish time
All certification dimensions at CERTIFIED or CONDITIONAL (max 1 waiver)
No release_blocker condition is active across any gate contract
Signal is PRACTICAL_FINISH only when all completion_criteria are satisfied
Signal artifact is machine-readable JSON with all required fields
Signal includes the certification verdict from the unified test certification stack
Signal is idempotent — re-running produces identical result for same state
No deferred documentation blocks the practical-finish signal
Every deferred doc has a tracking bead for post-finish completion
Documentation priority is ranked by user-facing impact
Handoff list is frozen at practical-finish time — no additions after signal

release_blockers: any required gate contract missing or failing validation
open child beads under bd-3ar8v.7 exceeding residual threshold
practical-finish signal artifact missing or malformed
